input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Payment Processing

I am encountering a payment processing error which might be related to outdated billing software. I have already restarted the system, checked the logs, and reached out to my bank You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. This error happened unexpectedly, and I would greatly appreciate your help in resolving it. My name is Carlos Mendoza.
